app.title: Adaptive IQ Test System
app.description: Take a comprehensive intelligence assessment with adaptive difficulty and real-time analytics

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
errors.server: Server error. Please try again later.

welcome.title: Adaptive IQ Test System
welcome.description: Take a comprehensive intelligence assessment with adaptive difficulty and real-time analytics. Get professional-grade results in just 30 minutes.

adaptive.title: Adaptive Difficulty
adaptive.description: Questions adjust to your skill level in real-time using advanced algorithms

timed.title: Timed Assessment
timed.description: 30-minute comprehensive test with per-question time limits

categories.title: Multiple Categories
categories.description: Pattern recognition, spatial reasoning, logic, memory, and math puzzles

scoring.title: Real-time Scoring
scoring.description: Advanced IRT-based scoring with percentile rankings

standardized.title: Standardized Results
standardized.description: Results comparable to professional IQ assessments

analytics.title: Instant Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed performance breakdown and improvement insights

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.item1: Answer each question to the best of your ability
instructions.item2: Questions will adapt to your performance level
instructions.item3: You cannot go back to previous questions
instructions.item4: Take your time but be mindful of the timer
instructions.item5: Ensure you have a stable internet connection
instructions.item6: Find a quiet environment free from distractions

welcome.disclaimer: This test is for educational and entertainment purposes. Results should not be used for clinical or professional assessment.
